content.description:
Amp Up And Amplify is a powerful lowball that ascends a solid overhang over a great landing.

Sit start with hands matched on a perfect, oblique rail. From there, work the hands up the rail, tic tac the feet into place, then move a big right hand to a sharp crimp, follow with another big move with the left hand to the lip (crux), reel the feet in, match a right hand on the lip, throw a heel over, and top it out.

There is a lower start that begins with two pockets. I didn't feel like the additional moves added much value to the problem, as they were awkward, and didn't really add difficulty to the problem. Nonetheless, it is an option.
content.protection: A few pads should do it, the immediate landing is great, but there a few rocks surrounding the fall zone.
content.location: It ascends the center of the northwest face.
